properties.name: reverse
properties.description: A logical variable indicating whether to reverse the order of calculations based on the x-axis.

properties.name: paired
properties.description: A logical variable indicating whether to perform pairing.

properties.name: alternative
properties.description: A character string specifying the alternative hypothesis.

properties.name: mu
properties.description: A number indicating the true value of the mean (or difference in means if you are performing a two sample test)

properties.name: var.equal
properties.description: A logical variable indicating whether to treat the two variances as being equal. If TRUE then the pooled variance is used to estimate the variance otherwise the Welch (or Satterthwaite) approximation to the degrees of freedom is used.
